Name: logistics
Title: Logistics | AidIQ.com
Body:
Logistics

Getting the right stuff to the right place at the right time.

Item Catalog(s)

Multiple Catalogs, Item Categories to any level of Hierarchy. Same Item can appear in multiple categories (or catalogs). Alternative Items for Matching.

Warehouse Inventory

Can be configured as a simple Inventory Tracking system or a full-blown Logistics system. Manage Intake, Shipments and Stock Checks. Within Sahana, any Site can have Inventory, but Warehouses have this as a focus.

Goods Received Notes (GRN), Waybills

Kitting & De-Kitting

Requests

Locate Inventory in warehouses (with appropriate permissions), support for Alternative Items

Asset Tracking

Track Assets throughout their life cycle

Fleet Management

Vehicles are a special class of Asset, with additional attributes. GPS Tracking.

Donations

Gift certificates

Relief Goods Distributions

Beneficiary Registration. ID cards. Barcode scanning to check eligibility & to confirm receipt.

Case Studies

  • Give2LA: Donations & Volunteer Management. Los Angeles Emergency Management Department
  • HELIOShare: InterAgency Information Sharing. HELIOS Foundation
  • Logistics Tool. Oxfam Myanmar
  • RGIMS: Relief Goods Inventory and Monitoring System. Philippines Department of Social Welfare and Development
  • RMS: Resource Management System. International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
